alert.note: Alert for Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 8:57PM CDT until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Georgetown affecting White, Woodruff and Prairie Counties. White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Georgetown. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor street flooding in Georgetown including Heath Scott Drive and Riverside Street near the boat ramp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 22.0 feet Sunday, April 09. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date White River Georgetown 21.0 23.4 Thu 8 PM 23.3 23.1 22.9 **CRESTING** &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
